name: VR Space Roller Coaster Galaxy
description:
Immersive in our vr game. Explore solar system in 360 degree. Feel like astronaut and go to the journey through space but in vr. Visit all planets like mars, jupiter or saturn. Look at the sizes of planets. Compare venus to neptune. VR solar system waiting for you but this is not all.
Go farther than this. Go to space mission. Galaxy spacewalk, spaceship mission through the asteroids and many others.

What you can find in this vr game?
for google cardboard and vr headset
solar system
vr space exploration
virtual reality
spacewalk
360 degree

Works on many vr headset, ready for google cardboard and others.
